trans-unit.source: A bitmap effect that paints a drop shadow around the target texture.
trans-unit.target: 绘制在目标纹理周围投影一个位图效果效果。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a value that indicates the radius of the shadow's blur effect.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指示卷影的模糊效果的半径。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates the radius of the shadow's blur effect.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，该值指示卷影的半径模糊效果。

trans-unit.source: The default is 5.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.BlurRadius*> dependency property.
To be added.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>对象，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying this object's dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (which may no longer resolve), but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制此对象的依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of this instance.
The returned clone is effectively a deep copy of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 返回的复本实际上是当前对象的深层副本。

trans-unit.source: The clone's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>对象，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are copied.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、 数据绑定和动画，而复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the drop shadow.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置投影的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The color of the drop shadow.
The default is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Colors.Black*>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.Color*> dependency property.
To be added.
To be added.
Gets or sets the direction of the drop shadow.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置投影的方向。

trans-unit.source: The direction of the drop shadow, in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 投影，以度为单位的方向。

trans-unit.source: The default is 315.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.Direction*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the opacity of the drop shadow.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置投影的不透明度。

trans-unit.source: The opacity of the drop shadow.
The default is 1.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.Opacity*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the system renders the drop shadow with emphasis on speed or quality.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示系统是否呈现投影时是强调速度或质量。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.RenderingBias"></xref> value that indicates whether the system renders the drop shadow with emphasis on speed or quality.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.RenderingBias"> </xref>值，该值指示系统是否呈现投影时是强调速度或质量。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.RenderingBias"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.RenderingBias*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the distance of the drop shadow below the texture.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置投影纹理下方的距离。

trans-unit.source: The distance of the drop shadow below the texture.
The default is 5.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.ShadowDepth*> dependency property.
To be added.
